titleStmt.title: God's judgments upon regicides a sermon preached in the Fleet-prison on the 30th day of January 1682/3, proving that the bloud of that pious monarch and glorious martyr, King Charles the First, is not yet expiated / by J. Butler, B.D., chaplain to His Grace the Duke of Ormond.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Butler)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Moore and J. Ashburne for Awnsham Churchill ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
